availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Marshall County, Kentucky, attorney. Kentucky native. Married Azelia Berry Gilbert. Father of Charles Gilbert. Clerk of the Marshall County Court in Benton, Kentucky. Elected to the House of Representatives of the Commonwealth of Kentucky in 1861.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Marshall County, Benton, p. 3. Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), 7Population7 Schedules, Kentucky, Marshall County, District 3, p. 1.
Kentucky Birth, Marriage and Death Records – Microfilm (1852-1910), Kentucky Department for Libraries and Archives, Frankfort, Kentucky. Roll #994048, microfilm p. 8. Memorial Record of Western Kentucky, Volume I (Lewis Publishing Company, 1904), 32-33. Find A Grave, "Jesse Carter Gilbert (1831-1894)," Memorial #81765479, https://www.findagrave.com/cgi-bin/fg.cgi?page=gr&GRid=81765479 (accessed June, 02, 2017).
